b'@rubicon59 conservative assumption of 40% YoY growth, FY4 @ 10x LTM rev gets you over $1Bn. $IDT'

b'@mspacey4415 net2phone UCaaS (therefore ex platform services) posted ~$32MM of rev in FY2020A (~30% YoY) and segment blended GM was ~76%. UCaaS is trading at high multiples in public mkts, apply even a 7x here and you get surplus of total $IDT EV. Add POS and you\xe2\x80\x99re surpassing $IDT mkt cap.'
